article.title: Symmetricom Awarded $4 Million Contract to Supply Timing for Next-Generation Global Positioning System
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Symmetricom Incorporated has been awarded a contract from ITT Corporation Space Systems Division valued at a minimum of $4 million, part of the building of GPS IIIA, the next-generation Global Positioning System (GPS) Space System program. Under the award, Symmetricom will deliver its Model 9552 ovenized quartz master oscillators and will develop, qualify and deliver flight oscillators for the first two space vehicles.
